There is no help. This mod is broken in new KSP-Versions.

[@SpannerMonkey(smce)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/) You said you had a working RKE Kanadarm in 1.3. I'm wondering if there is anything you have working in 1.6 or anything anyone else has working in 1.6?
